thread.title: Antibiotic rejuvenation could outsmart the superbugs

title: Antibiotic rejuvenation could outsmart the superbugs
text:
Antibiotic rejuvenation could outsmart the superbugs Wednesday, February 07, 2018 - 02:10 
Helperby Therapeutics is developing a method that rejuvenates old antibiotics that are in danger of becoming obsolete. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Helperby Therapeutics is developing a method that rejuvenates old antibiotics that are in danger of becoming obsolete. Matthew Stock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EsHY60
